comments.body: Why did the height change by 4px?
Because before, the font size was large enough to be constrained by the fixed-height container, and now it is allowed to grow to it's proper size.  The overall widget is still the correct size.
Does the test also check the correct size?

Please insert a comment:
```dart
// Regression test for https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/40702.
```
Shouldn't you change L834 from `TestGesture? gesture` to `TestGesture gesture`?
line 880 assigns null to it, so I can't :)
Interesting that we have this big warning here, but not in all the other test files that do this.

Yeah, this was something Ian asked for in the review when I was creating this test, before the pattern was established in the repo. He (rightly) was nervous about adding dynamic casts like this, and wanted me to make it clear that it wasn't for production code. I decided to preserve the warning, because it's a good warning. I thought about putting it elsewhere too, but it felt a bit like littering.
